name: Gang Violins
description: Ambient / cinematic electronic duo from Aotearoa New Zealand, creating atmospheric soundscapes that blend electronic elements with cinematic compositions.

name: Sora Shima
description: Instrumental post-rock from New Zealand. Inspired by Japanese anime, they fuse elements of heavy indie, cinematic ambient and atmospheric electronic to create emotionally driven soundscapes.

name: Shepherds Of Cassini
description: New Zealand post metal / progressive rock band from Auckland, crafting powerful and dynamic compositions that push the boundaries of heavy music.

name: Stray Theories
description: Stray Theories is the ambient music project of New Zealand based, Australian musician/composer, Micah Templeton-Wolfe, creating immersive ambient soundscapes.

name: Outside In
description: Five piece Auckland prog-rockers who produce an exhilarating sound that plays with complex time signatures and non-traditional song structures, delivering innovative progressive rock compositions.

name: Mikey Videotape
description: A unique fusion of progressive rock, pop sensibilities, and a distinctive 80s-inspired aesthetic, creating nostalgic yet forward-thinking musical experiences.
